name: Fire, Ice and Everything Between
description:
A short puzzle game I made for the very short game jam "Jame Gam #5".

The basic principle is to find a spot where the temperature is close to neutral and stay there until you go to the next level. I think the main problem with it is that I wanted to make 12 levels, which is too many for such a short jam. For this reason, I think the puzzles are very unintersting.
